informationNeed.text: prefix zag: <zag:> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> select distinct ?document where { ?document zag:language 'spa' . ?document zag:type ?t . filter(?t = 'TAZ-TFG' || ?t = 'TAZ-TFM') . ?document zag:date ?y . filter(?y >= '2003') . optional { (?document ?sc1) text:query (zag:title 'animación' )} . optional { (?document ?sc2) text:query (zag:description 'animación' )} . optional { (?document ?sc3) text:query (zag:subject 'animación' )} . optional { (?document ?sc4) text:query (zag:title 'visión computador' )} . optional { (?document ?sc5) text:query (zag:description 'visión computador' )} . optional { (?document ?sc6) text:query (zag:subject 'visión computador' )} . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0)*0.3 + coalesce(?sc2,0)*0.2 + coalesce(?sc3,0)*0.5 + coalesce(?sc4,0)*0.3 + coalesce(?sc5,0)*0.2 + coalesce(?sc6,0)*0.5 as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } order by desc (?score)

prefix zag: <zag:> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> select distinct ?document where { ?document zag:date ?y . filter(?y >= '2012') . filter (?y <= '2018') . optional { (?document ?sc1) text:query (zag:title 'canina perro') } . optional { (?document ?sc2) text:query (zag:description 'canina perro') } . optional { (?document ?sc3) text:query (zag:subject 'canina perro') } . optional { (?document ?sc4) text:query (zag:title 'felina gato') } . optional { (?document ?sc5) text:query (zag:description 'felina gato') } . optional { (?document ?sc6) text:query (zag:subject 'felina gato') } . optional { (?document ?sc7) text:query (zag:title 'veterinaria') } . optional { (?document ?sc8) text:query (zag:description 'veterinaria') } . optional { (?document ?sc9) text:query (zag:subject 'veterinaria') } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0)*0.3 + coalesce(?sc2,0)*0.2 + coalesce(?sc3,0)*0.5 + coalesce(?sc4,0)*0.3 + coalesce(?sc5,0)*0.2 + coalesce(?sc6,0)*0.5 + coalesce(?sc7,0)*0.6 + coalesce(?sc8,0)*0.4 + coalesce(?sc9,0) as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } order by desc (?score)

prefix zag: <zag:> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> select distinct ?document where { ?document zag:type ?t . filter(?t = 'TAZ-TFG' || ?t = 'TAZ-TFM') . ?document zag:publisher ?publisher . ?document zag:creator ?creator . ?document zag:contributor ?contributor . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?publisher), 'INFORMÁTICA')) bind (0.6 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (?creator, 'López')) bind (1 as ?sc2) } . optional { filter (contains (?contributor, 'López')) bind (0.3 as ?sc3) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } order by desc (?score)

prefix zag: <zag:> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> select distinct ?document where { filter not exists { ?document zag:title ?title . filter(contains(?title, 'XX') || contains(?title, 'XXI')) } . filter not exists { ?document zag:description ?desc . filter(contains(?desc, 'XX') || contains(?desc, 'XXI')) } . filter not exists { ?document zag:subject ?subj . filter(contains(?subj, 'XX') || contains(?subj, 'XXI')) } . optional { (?document ?sc1) text:query (zag:title 'arte') } . optional { (?document ?sc2) text:query (zag:description 'arte') } . optional { (?document ?sc3) text:query (zag:subject 'arte') } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0)*0.4 + coalesce(?sc2,0)*0.3 + coalesce(?sc3,0)*0.4 as ?scorearte) . optional { (?document ?sc4) text:query (zag:title 'aragón') } . optional { (?document ?sc5) text:query (zag:description 'aragón') } . optional { (?document ?sc6) text:query (zag:subject 'aragón') } . bind (?scorearte + coalesce(?sc4,0) + coalesce(?sc5,0)*0.6 + coalesce(?sc6,0)*0.7 as ?score) . filter(?score > 0) } order by desc (?score)

prefix zag: <zag:> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> select distinct ?document where { optional { (?document ?sc1) text:query (zag:title 'algoritmo búsqueda') } . optional { (?document ?sc2) text:query (zag:description 'algoritmo búsqueda') } . optional { (?document ?sc3) text:query (zag:subject 'algoritmo búsqueda') } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) as ?scorealgbusq) . filter (?scorealgbusq > 0) . optional { (?document ?sc4) text:query (zag:title 'medicina') } . optional { (?document ?sc5) text:query (zag:description 'medicina') } . optional { (?document ?sc6) text:query (zag:subject 'medicina') } . optional { (?document ?sc7) text:query (zag:title 'cadena proteínas') } . optional { (?document ?sc8) text:query (zag:description 'cadena proteínas') } . optional { (?document ?sc9) text:query (zag:subject 'cadena proteínas') } . optional { (?document ?sc10) text:query (zag:title 'paciente síntoma') } . optional { (?document ?sc11) text:query (zag:description 'paciente síntoma') } . optional { (?document ?sc12) text:query (zag:subject 'paciente síntoma') } . bind (coalesce(?sc4,0) + coalesce(?sc5,0) + coalesce(?sc6,0) + coalesce(?sc7,0) + coalesce(?sc8,0) + coalesce(?sc9,0) + coalesce(?sc10,0) + coalesce(?sc11,0) + coalesce(?sc12,0) as ?scoremedicina) . filter (?scoremedicina > 0) . bind (?scorealgbusq*0.15 + ?scoremedicina*0.3 as ?score) } order by desc (?score)
